Subsection.Text: It is unlawful for any person to perform or assist in performing an abortion on a person, except in an emergency care situation, other than in a validly licensed hospital or abortion clinic or in a physician’s office.
It is unlawful for any person or public body to establish, conduct, manage, or operate an abortion clinic without a valid current license.
It is unlawful for any person to perform or assist in performing an abortion on a person in the third trimester other than in a hospital.
Any person who willfully violates any provision of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor of the second degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082 or s. 775.083.
